what: Easily Source Publicly Available Data on Derivatives
title: Easily Source Publicly Available Data on Derivatives
text: Liquidity pricing --counter (OTC) derivative markets tended less transparent exchange traded (lit) equivalents. Bank International Settlements (BIS) published statistics trading OTC markets triennual basis. However, representative statistics volume pricing data frequent basis near impossible obtain. Post-GFC derivatives reforms lifted veil markets.

title: Easily Source Publicly Available Data on Derivatives
text: --Counter (OTC) derivatives Made Available Trade (MAT) CTFC. means must traded Swap Execution Facilities (SEFs). SEFs compelled publish trading volume prices MAT derivatives daily basis. widely used SEFs run Bloomberg, ICAP, Tullett Prebon Tradeweb among others.

title: Easily Source Publicly Available Data on Derivatives
text: key economic terms traded swaps must reported authorised Swap Data Repository (SDR). widely used SDRs DTCC Data Repository, ICE Trade Vault CME’s SDR. CFTC provides weekly snapshots data collected SDRs weekly basis. SDRs domiciled different regulatory jurisdications expected provide differing levels data. U.S. regulations compel U.S. domiciled SDRs provide (anonymised) trade level data public SDRs jurisdictions (e.g. Europe) expected far less granular, typically aggregated, data.

title: Easily Source Publicly Available Data on Derivatives
text: can source OTC derivatives data supported sources. Supported sources include BloombergSEF several U.S. domiciled SDRs including DTCC’s DDR, Bloomberg’s SDR CME. SDRs jurisdictions provide trade level data consequently sources unsupported. sources provide trade level data added time (pull requests end welcome).

title: Easily Source Publicly Available Data on Derivatives
text: can download daily trade data executed BloombergSEF: can also download data reported DTCC’s CME’s SDRs:

title: Get Bloomberg SEF data — bsef
text: Bloomberg Swap Execution Facility (SEF) offers customers ability execute derivative instruments across number different asset classes. required make publicly available price, trading volume trading data. publishes data website. reverse engineered JavaScript libraries used website call Bloomberg Application Service using POST requests target URL.

title: Get Bloomberg SEF data — bsef
text: start date data required Date DateTime object. year, month day elements object used. Must length one. end date data required Date DateTime object. year, month day elements object used. Must length one. Defaults start date. asset_class asset class like download trade data. Valid inputs "CR" (credit), "IR" (rates), "EQ" (equities), "FX" (foreign exchange), "CO" (commodities) must string.

title: Get Bloomberg SEF data — bsef
text: tibble containing requested data, empty tibble data unavailable

title: Get Bloomberg SEF data — bsef
text: Bloomberg SEF data

title: Get CME SDR data — cme
text: CME Swap Data Repository (SDR) registered U.S. swap data repository allows market participants fulfil public disclosure obligations U.S. legislation. CME required make publicly available price, trading volume trading data. publishes data FTP site. Column specs inferred records file (.e. guess_max set Inf calling readr::read_csv).

title: Get CME SDR data — cme
text: date date data required Date DateTime object. use year, month day elements determine set trades return. return set trades day starting date. asset_class asset class like download trade data. Valid inputs  "IR" (rates), "FX" (foreign exchange), "CO" (commodities). must string. show_col_types FALSE (default), show guessed column types. TRUE always show column types, even supplied. NULL show column types explicitly supplied col_types argument.

title: Get CME SDR data — cme
text: tibble containing requested data, empty tibble data unavailable

title: Get CME SDR data — cme
text: CME SDR

title: Get DDR data — ddr
text: DTCC Data Repository registered U.S. swap data repository allows market participants fulfil public disclosure obligations U.S. legislation. function give ability download trade-level data reported market participants. Column specs inferred records file (.e. guess_max set Inf calling readr::read_csv).

title: Get DDR data — ddr
text: date date data required Date DateTime object. year, month day elements object used must length one. asset_class asset class like download trade data. Valid inputs "CR" (credit), "IR" (rates), "EQ" (equities), "FX" (foreign exchange), "CO" (commodities). must string. show_col_types FALSE (default), show guessed column types. TRUE always show column types, even supplied. NULL show column types explicitly supplied col_types argument.

title: Get DDR data — ddr
text: tibble contains requested data. data exists date, empty tibble returned.

title: Get DDR data — ddr
text: DDR Real Time Dissemination Platform

title: Get DDR data — ddr
code: if (FALSE) { ddr(as.Date("2017-05-25"), "IR") # Not empty ddr(as.Date("2020-12-01"), "CR") # Not empty }

title: Version 0.4.0
text: functions make use httr2 rather mix httr base::download.file(). Now requires R 4.1.0 greater allow use new native syntax anonymous functions pipes. bsef() now takes start end date reflecting updates API. Support field_specs argument dropped. robust better handled users. Instead, now guesses field specs ingested records. can show specs setting show_col_types argument TRUE. can now download files days 30 Nov 2020 (fixes #33). Support field_specs argument dropped. robust better handled users. Instead, now guesses field specs ingested records. can show specs setting show_col_types argument TRUE.

title: Version 0.3.2
text: Remove BSDR package service ceased CFTC registration withdrawn (#32)

title: Version 0.3.1
text: CRAN release: 2018-02-10 Fixed BSDR payload caused bsdr() fail (#28) Published package website Added code coverage

title: Version 0.3.0
text: CRAN release: 2017-05-28

title: Version 0.3.0
text: bsdr() retrieve Bloomberg SDR data (also closes #23) bsef() retrieve Bloomberg SEF data ddr() retrieve DTCC Data Repository data (also closes #25) cme() retrieve CME SDR data

title: Version 0.3.0
text: get_bsdr_data() defunct. Use new function bsdr() instead different interface get_bsdr_data(). get_bsef_data() defunct. Use new function bsef() instead different interface get_bsef_data(). get_ddr_data() defunct. Use new function ddr() instead different interface get_ddr_data(). get_cme_data() defunct. Use new function cme() instead different interface get_cme_data().

title: Version 0.3.0
text: Bumped minimum version requirements R well readr, httr utils packages. latter ensure downloader::download() can replaced implementation utils::download.file() supports https: URLs. Replaced calls httr::url_ok() expressions containing httr::status_code() former deprecated Expanded CI support macOS (Travis) Windows (Appveyor)

title: Version 0.2.1
text: CRAN release: 2015-09-27 Network dependent tests disabled CRAN may reliable. Suppress CME warnings. FTP server demonstrates poor behaviour non-existent files.

title: Version 0.2.0
text: CRAN release: 2015-09-10 Added ability source trade data SDRs (DTCC, Bloomberg CME) (#7) Can now specify asset_class get_bsef_data(). Defaults downloading data asset classes Getters return empty data frame data unavailable date requested (#16) Can now specify whether raw data extracted various data sources processed using curate argument. Deprecated ICAP SEF capabilities (unstable) Removed packrat-sourced download() method favour downloader package (#12) Messages longer printed REPL (#18)

title: Version 0.1.0
text: Implemented ability access Bloomberg ICAP SEF data
